mapper.select: select cq1.cq_no, cq_title, cq_content, to_char(cq_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mm:ss') cq_date, q_no from commentqna cq1 inner join (select max(cq_no) cq_no from commentqna group by(q_no)) cq2 on cq1.cq_no = cq2.cq_no
mapper.insert: insert into commentqna(cq_no, cq_title, cq_content, q_no) values(commentqna_seq.nextval, #{cq_title}, #{cq_content}, #{q_no})
